document: Attendance Policy: Guidelines on class participation, absences, and excused leaves.
Code of Conduct: Behavioral expectations, disciplinary measures, and grievance procedures.
Research Ethics: Procedures for ethical approval, data protection, and publication integrity.
Remote Learning Policy: Technical requirements, attendance verification, and evaluation methods.
Laboratory Safety Rules: Equipment handling, protective gear, and emergency procedures.
IT Usage Policy: Network security, acceptable use of institutional devices, and password management.
Counseling Services Info: Confidentiality, appointment booking, and emergency contacts.
Financial Aid Policy: Tuition payment plans, refund guidelines, and hardship requests.
Plagiarism Policy: Turnitin thresholds, reporting mechanisms, and appeal process.
Health and Safety Protocol: Campus medical support, sanitation measures, and emergency response plan.
Login failure on portal. Includes steps to reproduce and photo.
